content: measurements 125 cm / 49 1/4 x 100 cm / 39½ 1 square measures approx 25 x 25 cm / 9 3/4 x 9 3/4 materials drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 300 g color 0501 gray 300 g color 0517 medium gray 200 g color 2923 golden rod 100 g color 0500 light gray 100 g color 0100 off white the piece can also be crocheted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group c see the link below drops crochet hook size 5 5 mm/us 9 or the size needed to get 14 double crochets and 8 5 row on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height
